### Checklist

- [ ] I have read [the contributing guide](https://github.com/kkrainov/dbt-oxide/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) and understand what's expected of me.
- [ ] I have run this code in development, and it appears to resolve the stated issue.
- [ ] This PR includes tests, or tests are not required or relevant for this PR.
- [ ] I have signed my commits with DCO (`git commit -s`).
- [ ] For Rust changes: I have run `cargo fmt` and `cargo clippy`.
- [ ] For Python changes: I have run the test suite (`uv run pytest tests/unit`).
